programs.name: Check if a Number is Positive
programs.code: let num = 5; if (num > 0) { console.log('The number is positive'); } else { console.log('The number is not positive'); }

programs.name: Logical AND with Two Conditions
programs.code: let a = 5, b = 10; if (a < b && a != b) { console.log('Both conditions are true'); } else { console.log('One or both conditions are false'); }
